csr.cpu_fifo.rx.trigger

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x14
Size:
0x4
Source:
csr.rdl

Description

Rx FIFO Trigger Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] tvalid rw 0x0 csr.cpu_fifo.rx.trigger.tvalid

Field Descriptions

tvalid - csr.cpu_fifo.rx.trigger.tvalid

Indicates valid transfer from the CPU to the Rx FIFO (single pulse trigger)
